html: During Watergate, principled Republicans stood up and saved our country from a constitutional crisis. We need that again in 2018. If you’re worried about protecting the Mueller investigation, it’s time to make your voice heard in Congress NOW—before it’s too late.
text: During Watergate, principled Republicans stood up and saved our country from a constitutional crisis. We need that again in 2018. If you’re worried about protecting the Mueller investigation, it’s time to make your voice heard in Congress NOW—before it’s too late.

html: The ultimate goal—and the huge danger to our democracy—is for Trump to get Republicans in Congress to help slow or shut down this investigation, and to do so soon, before Mueller can get to the bottom of Trump's own activities.

html: That’s why it’s critical for our nation to support programs like @multco-based Healthy Birth Initiatives—the only program in Oregon focusing on birth-related health disparities in the African American community.

html: It is shocking and unacceptable that Black women are 3-4 times more likely to die from pregnancy-related complications than white women.
text: It is shocking and unacceptable that Black women are 3-4 times more likely to die from pregnancy-related complications than white women.

html: I’m proud to support @BlkMamasMatter and join with @SenKamalaHarris to honor this week as Black Maternal Health Week.

html: As the planet warms, climate-related disasters are becoming the new normal.
